***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Borrowed from Sanskrit अहंकार (ahaṃkāra).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [əhəŋkaɾə]
**** Noun[edit] ****
अहङ्कार • (ahaṅkāra) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐀𑐴𑐒𑑂𑐎𑐵𑐬)
   1. pride, haughtiness
   2. egotism, ahamkara
***** Pali[edit] *****
**** Alternative forms[edit] ****
Alternative forms
    * ahaṃkāra (Latin script)
    * 𑀅𑀳𑀁𑀓𑀸𑀭 (Brahmi script)
    * अहंकार (Devanagari script)
    * অহংকার (Bengali script)
    * අහංකාර (Sinhalese script)
    * အဟံကာရ (Burmese script)
    * อหํการ or อหงฺการ (Thai script)
    * ᩋᩉᩴᨠᩣᩁ (Tai Tham script)
    * ອຫໍກາຣ or ອະຫັງກາຣະ (Lao script)
    * អហំការ or អហង្ការ (Khmer script)
    * 𑄃𑄦𑄁𑄇𑄂𑄢 (Chakma script)
**** Noun[edit] ****
अहङ्कार m
   1. egotism, arrogance, ahamkara
